commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.body:
If caret is on a module e.g. Pod::Html, then the entire module (with namespace) will be looked up.
If no word is under caret, an input dialog is shown.
If no documentation is found, a tool tip is shown.

commits.summary: Change Hash Pointer snippet shortcut to <kbd class='keyEquivalent'>⌃&</kbd>gt;
commits.body: This avoids a conflict with <kbd class='keyEquivalent'>⌃L</kbd> which centers the caret on screen.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Add perl shebang line snippet (<kbd class='tabTrigger'>pl⇥</kbd>)
commits.body: This is usable in any document provided the `pl` trigger is at the very start of the document.

commits.author: Marcus Ramberg
commits.summary: Run perl from project root, remove taint check, add lib
commits.body: Disable taint checking, which is useless and doesn't work with many modules. Also run from project root and include 'lib', so that you can use it with modules that have dependencies on other classes in the same project.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Prevent `>` from being used to open a regular expression.
commits.body:
This prevents confusion inside a file handle line reading operator. For example:

	foreach my $file (<$FILES{ELEMENTS}/*.s>) {}

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Let TextMate save (on <kbd class='keyEquivalent'>⌘R</kbd>) unless document is untitled
commits.body: This is a subtle change but it means that all but untitled documents are saved by TextMate where previously the command would always be responsible for saving, which meant encoding, callbacks, and similar weren’t respected, and there was a theoretical synchronization problem (TextMate having to get notified that the file changed on disk and notice that it was (now) identical to the modified version in memory).
